_artifacts.description:
Handmade solid gold ring crafted for everyday wear and milestone moments. The band has a clean, minimalist silhouette that stacks beautifully or stands alone as a wedding band. Edges are gently rounded for a comfortable fit you can keep on all day. Choose your preferred gold toneâ€”Rose, White, or Yellowâ€”so it pairs naturally with your existing jewelry and personal style.

Built in genuine gold with no plating, this ring is available in 14k or 18k (10k upon request). Sizes range from US 4 to 14Â¾. The surface is refined and smooth to sit light on the hand, making it ideal as a dainty stacker or a classic band. Each piece is made to order with careful finishing. Packaging includes a special box; a gift note can be added on request. We do not state or infer gemstone details unless provided by you; images are used only for general presentation.

Shipping uses the LUXURYJEWELERY profile with a handling time of 1â€“3 business days. Tracked delivery typically arrives in 2â€“5 business days to Canada, the US, Germany, the UK, and France; customs duties are paid by the seller. Care is simple: avoid harsh chemicals, and lightly clean with mild soap and water when needed. If you need a different karat, a specific width, or a personalized engraving, please message before purchase so we can confirm feasibility without altering the final design intent.
_artifacts.note: Non-authoritative snapshot for continuity across sessions; real source of truth remains step outputs.

00.description: Patch sonrasÄ± otomatik doÄŸrulama: required_rule_ids ve required_requires kontrolÃ¼. PASS deÄŸilse kritik akÄ±ÅŸlar durur.
00.name: Self-Check (arka planda)
rules: validate each step has all required ruleset IDs
validate each step has required 'requires' deps (e.g., 0a for CSV-driven steps)
produce a detailed report of missing IDs/deps
self_check.status = PASS if no issues else FAIL
CSV: On upload, detect encoding (Office 2007/Turkish) and parse with defined dialect; never auto-infer types.
CSV: Header count must equal data field count (or +1 with removable leading numeric index for Top/Competitor files).
CSV: Preserve empty strings and literal 'NaN'; do NOT invent NaN; do NOT trim inside quotes.
CSV: Snapshot parsed table under /_runs/<run_id>/csv/<type> and compute sha256; block run if header/data mismatch.
ROW NORMALIZE (Top/Competitor): If data row has expected+1 columns and first cell is pure numeric index, drop that first cell to align with headers.
ROW NORMALIZE (Similar Keywords): If data row has expected+1 columns and last cell is empty, drop the trailing empty cell to align with headers.
PRE-RUN: Show /workflow_patches/steps/0 (Product Info) fields in FULL (no summary). Ask user: 'DeÄŸiÅŸiklik var mÄ±? (EVET/HAYIR)'. If EVET, block run and request exact edits; if HAYIR, continue.
PRE-RUN: Capture product_info_snapshot under /_runs/<run_id>/product_info_snapshot with hash; require user_ack=true before step 1.
ENFORCE: Fail run if any /policy/guard/mandatory_fields/step_0 item is missing/empty OR if snapshot missing/mismatched.
ENFORCE: Steps must run sequentially by key order; skipping/fast-forward is forbidden unless 'requires' explicitly satisfied and user_ack present for gated steps.
ENFORCE: Any user-gated step with 'block_until_user_ack:true' cannot auto-advance and must be acknowledged by the user before proceeding.
00.title: Self-Check

operations: concat -> dedupe (case-insensitive, diacritics normalized)

ev = volume * conv_prob(competition, ctr, cvr); score += ev_weight*normalize(ev)

operations: concat -> dedupe (case-insensitive, diacritics normalized)
